notesStmt.note: This manuscript was likely composed in late June 1863, after William Grover—a Union soldier in the 46th Pennsylvania Infantry—was executed by firing squad for desertion on June 19, 1863. Whitman also notes Grover's execution in his "Hospital Note book," (Huntington Library) in an entry that, according to Whitman, was composed sometime during the week following Grover's death.
